Photo_Search app displays photos for anything you are looking for.\n Type your search word on the SearchView and a list of related photos will be displayed.\n When clicking on a photo, you can see its details and download it to your gallery!

Modern JSON library for Android and Java. It makes the process of Parsing and Converting a JSON object into Java and Kotlin objects much easier.
